author: Elastic
Austin Songer
description: Identifies the deletion of an Amazon Relational Database Service (RDS) Security Group.
false_positives: A RDS security group deletion may be done by a system or network administrator. Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment. Security Group deletions from unfamiliar users or hosts should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
name: AWS RDS Security Group Deletion
note:
## Config

The AWS Fleet integration, Filebeat module, or similarly structured data is required to be compatible with this rule.
query: event.dataset:aws.cloudtrail and event.provider:rds.amazonaws.com and event.action:DeleteDBSecurityGroup and event.outcome:success
